mapper.insert:
/**************************** 입양 등록 AnimalAdoptionMapper.xml - adoption.register *********************************/
INSERT INTO ADOPTION_TBL ( ANIAML_NAME, AGE, SPECIES, GENDR, INOCULATION, ILIKE, DISLIKE, NEUTERING, SIGNIFICANT ) VALUES ( #{aniaml_name}, #{age}, #{species}, #{gendr}, #{inoculation}, #{ilike}, #{dislike}, #{neutering}, #{significant}, )
